page.title: 20DETAILS - BROWN KNOWL HOUSE
page.content: {FOUNDATIONS}75cm x 32cm concrete/brick {CELLAR}solid concrete blocks each 45x21x10cm and thermalite blocks. Concrete joists used, giving strength to living area above. Cellar depth 2m. {HOUSE}10.3m x 9.7m; detached 2 car brick garage with slate roof. Gravel drive with limestone base 15m x 5m. {INSULATION}10cm wall cavity filled with rock-wool pad; roof space has 15cm fibre glass. {WINDOWS and FRONT DOOR}white P.V.C. with gas-filled double-glazing. Back door of solid hardwood. Interior doors of frame construction, clad in sapele. {WORK SCHEDULE}8.30-4.30, 5 days/week. {TRADESMEN} 3 plumbers, 2 bricklayers, 2 electricians, 2 joiners(daily av.=2) {QUANTITIES}18500 bricks at 16p each. 2,500 con.blocks and 4,500 therm. each 30p. 4.5 tons cement and 3,950 slates, second-hand, at 47p each.
